Articles.Content:
Okay everyone calm down for just a second.

crasher: Keep at it. Even though your first mods might look bad, you get better with experience. Also, typing normally really helps to make you look more professional, so it's best to have good grammar and spelling.

sumghai: Get off his back. Seriously you have no reason to be such a jackass, especially to someone just starting out. I can understand being blunt, but you're just being rude.

Well here you go

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Right off the bat, the cockpit is way too pointy - the original has more of an ogive.

sumghai: Get off his back. Seriously you have no reason to be such a jackass, especially to someone just starting out. I can understand being blunt, but you're just being rude.

Take a long, hard look at your signature, like I've already done.

Right off the bat, the cockpit is way too pointy - the original has more of an ogive.

Take a long, hard look at your signature, like I've already done.

I agree with most of what you said, I just think It good have been worded a bit nicer, and as previously stated, the cockpit could be a bit rounder on the end. other than that, it looks pretty good.

the pointed cockpit is for the mirror universe version but i will make 2nd cockpit with a rounder tip

also checkout the front page for a skechfab!

the pointed cockpit is for the mirror universe version but i will make 2nd cockpit with a rounder tip

Bear in mind that according to the official canon from the shows, there is no specific mirror universe version that has a pointed tip (In a Mirror, Darkly simply reused the exact same footage from First Contact, save for the scene where the humans raid the Vulcan lander).

Bear in mind that according to the official canon from the shows, there is no specific mirror universe version that has a pointed tip (In a Mirror, Darkly simply reused the exact same footage from First Contact, save for the scene where the humans raid the Vulcan lander).

Well I'm not only making the oficcal phoenix I'm making my own versions as well
I've been watching this thread for a while, but nice to see some progress after a few chatty pages.

but i will fix that issue.

I would like to resign from my post as tester effective now, because you have nothing to test and probably Won't have anything to test for the next half a dozen millennia judging on your rate of work.
I'd like to test, in Darth's place
I will still be PA Officer, and if you need more than one tester I'll be happy to help.

kk sorry i have been VERY busy with my life so i apologize.

unfortunately effective Saturday August 14th this project will go freeze for 2 weeks, (i have vacation) and with the new update i'm waiting for the .21 part tools to come out, (need to check on that) not to mention i have been playing .21.

if you want darth the cockpit can be cut and added to the game easily that should give you something to test

whats going on here? you make thats of on ah? why u have tried to make this? if u have any reason.i see this you tube video.you are going to make that one ? is it possible? ok weldon do it well

We've got the Pentagon's top cryptologists working 24/7 trying to figure out what the [redacted] you just said!

Anyway in seirusness I'm still alive but currently on vacation and unable to work on this due to that ill be gone for another week or so. But I cant wait to get back to work on the phoenix!
The first parts( two different styles of cockpits) have Been released to the tester(me).After 4 months of needless bickering and criticizing this is finally getting somewhere.
